revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: [(Col.) 176];;[On the . . (6th of Thoth?), similarly:];[Apynchis, son of Sarapion and Thaisas, grandson of Euemeros, for ch(--): 8 drachmai;[- - -, son of - - -] and Thaesis, [grandson of - - -]: the remainder of ch(--);[- - -, son of - - -] and Thaisas, [grandson of - - -]: the remainder of ch(--);[Ptolemaios, son of Satabous] and Aphrodous, grandson of Petheus, for ch(--): 4 drachmai;[Total] for the day: 16 drachmai 11 obols.;;[On the . . (7th?), similarly:];[Phanomgeus, son of Tesenouphis] and Thaesis, grandson of Harphaesis, for ch(--): 4 drachmai; (and) the remainder of ch(--);[Petsoraipis, son of Hatres] and Soeris, grandson of Imouthes, for ch(--): 4 drachmai; (and) the remainder of ch(--);[Mysthes, son of Teberis] and Isidora, grandson of Sambathion, for ch(--): 4 drachmai; (and) the remainder of ch(--);[Tauris, daughter of Zenon] - (through) Tiberinus the elder - [for garden land of year 13: for apomoira, . . .; for olive (transportation), . . .] 1/2 obol(s) 2 chalkoi; for naubion, 1 drachme 4 obols; for supplements, 4 drachmai 1 obol 2 chalkoi; [for eparourion, . . .; for supplements, . . .]; for kollybos, 3 1/2 obols 2 chalkoi. Total: 37 drachmai 2 obols 2 chalkoi].;[(And) for the naubion of the catoeci, for year 14: 1 drachme 4 obols; for supplements: 1 obol]; for kollybos: 2 chalkoi. Total: 1 drachme 5 obols 2 chalkoi.;[(And) for the naubion of owners of private land, similarly: 1 drachme 2 obols; for supplements: 1 1/2 obols 2 chalkoi; for kollybos], 2 chalkoi. Total: 1 drachme 4 obols.;[And (for) Euemeros, son of Chairemon, for garden land of year 13: for apomoira, 2 drachmai 3 obols; for olive (transportation), 2 obols 2 chalkoi; for naubion, 1 1/2 obols; for supplements], 3 1/2 obols 2 chalkoi; [for eparourion, 1 drachme 4 obols; for supplements, 1 obol; for kollybos, 1/2 obol 2 chalkoi]. Total: 5 drachmai 4 obols 2 chalkoi. (Lost in left margin: [48 drachmai . . obols].);[- - -, son of - - - and . .]ynchis, [grandson of - - -], for ch(--): 8 drachmai;[- - -, son of - - -] and Tapetheus, [grandson of - - -], for ch(--): 28 obols;[- - -, for garden land of year 13: for apomoira, 3 drachmai 1/2 obol 2 chalkoi; for olive (transportation), 2 1/2 obols 2 chalkoi; for naubion, 2 obols]; for supplements, 5 obols; [for eparourion, 2 drachmai 1/2 obol; for supplements, 1 obol 2 chalkoi; for kollybos, 1/2 obol 2 chalkoi]. Total: 7 drachmai 1 obol. (Lost in left margin: [4 drachmai 2* obols].);[- - -, son of - - -] and Segathis, [grandson of - - -]: 8 drachmai;[- - -, son of - - -] and Thases, [grandson of - - -], for ch(--): 4 drachmai;[- - -, son of - - - and . . .]theus, [grandson of - - -], for ch(--): 4 drachmai;(Traces of 1 more line)
